scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus on the cross against a golden, shimmering background. To the left of the cross stands the Virgin Mary, dressed in a dark robe with pink trim, her head bowed and hands clasped. Beside her is a white horse, and behind them are two figures in red and green garments. To the right of the cross, a figure in a blue robe and pink mantle kneels with hands clasped in prayer. Behind this kneeling figure are three other individuals, one wearing a blue cap, all looking towards the crucifixion. The ground is depicted as rocky and uneven.
